cron_jobs.name: Birthday Email Reminder
cron_jobs.description: Checks for birthdays and sends automated email greetings daily at 7:00 AM

notes: This cron job runs every day at 7:00 AM UTC
Adjust timezone in your deployment platform settings if needed
The endpoint will automatically query the database for birthdays matching today's date
Birthday emails will be sent to all matching users
Check server logs to monitor email delivery status
